text: Winston Conrad "Wink" Martindale (December 4, 1933 â€“ April 15, 2025) was an American disc jockey, radio personality, game show host, and television producer. He was best known as the host of Gambit from 1972 to 1976 (and again from 1980 to 1981), Tic-Tac-Dough from 1978 to 1985, High Rollers from 1987 to 1988, and Debt from 1996 to 1998. He died from lymphoma at a hospital in Rancho Mirage, California, on April 15, 2025, at the age of 91. Category:1933 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American game show hosts
title: Wink Martindale
